mdRecord.dcterms:title: LaFayette's Room, Mt. Vernon Mansion [Blue Room].
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 426 7th St., Washington, D. C. Only authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the Blue Room, formerly called Lafayette's Room, view towards northwest corner which includes part of the bedstead and fireplace. Label on the reverse reads: LaFayette's Room, Mt. Vernon Mansion, so called in consequence of its having been occupied by General LaFayette when visiting Washington at Mt. Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
Blue room
